"use client" import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import Navbar from "../components/Navbar" import { useUser } from "../context/UserContext" const DashboardPage = () => { const { user } = useUser() const [weather, setWeather] = useState({ temperature: 28, condition: "Sunny", humidity: 65, windSpeed: 12, }) const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalProducts: 12, activeOrders: 5, totalRevenue: 2450, equipmentRented: 3, }) const [recentActivity] = useState([ { id: 1, type: "sale", description: "Sold 50kg of maize to John Buyer", amount: 150, time: "2 hours ago" }, { id: 2, type: "equipment", description: "Rented tractor for 3 days", amount: -75, time: "1 day ago" }, { id: 3, type: "transport", description: "Transport request approved", amount: 0, time: "2 days ago" }, { id: 4, type: "sale", description: "Sold 30kg of beans to Mary Store", amount: 90, time: "3 days ago" }, ]) const [products] = useState([ { id: 1, name: "Maize", quantity: "200kg", price: "$3/kg", status: "Available" }, { id: 2, name: "Beans", quantity: "150kg", price: "$3.5/kg", status: "Available" }, { id: 3, name: "Sorghum", quantity: "100kg", price: "$2.8/kg", status: "Low Stock" }, { id: 4, name: "Groundnuts", quantity: "80kg", price: "$4/kg", status: "Available" }, ]) return (
{/* Header */}

Welcome back, {user?.firstName || user?.username}! üëã

Here's what's happening with your farm today.

{/* Stats Grid */}
{/* Main Content Grid */}
{/* Weather Card */}

Today's Weather

‚òÄÔ∏è
{weather.temperature}¬∞C
{weather.condition}
Humidity: {weather.humidity}%
Wind: {weather.windSpeed} km/h
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Actions

{/* Products and Activity */}
{/* My Products */}

My Products

{products.map((product) => ( ))}
{/* Recent Activity */}

Recent Activity

{recentActivity.map((activity) => ( ))}
) } const StatCard = ({ title, value, icon, color, change }) => (

{title}

{value}

{icon}

{change}

) const QuickActionButton = ({ icon, text, color }) => ( ) const ProductItem = ({ product }) => (

{product.name}

{product.quantity} ‚Ä¢ {product.price}

{product.status}
) const ActivityItem = ({ activity }) => { const getActivityIcon = (type) => { switch (type) { case "sale": return "üí∞" case "equipment": return "üöú" case "transport": return "üöõ" default: return "üìã" } } return (
{getActivityIcon(activity.type)}

{activity.description}

{activity.time}

{activity.amount !== 0 && ( 0 ? "#16a34a" : "#dc2626", fontWeight: "600", fontSize: "0.9rem", }} > {activity.amount > 0 ? "+" : ""}${Math.abs(activity.amount)} )}
) } export default DashboardPage
